By Vox Populi “The Russians are doing what we should be doing. We should send them a thank-you note and stay out of their way.”
“The landscaping at Chatham Plaza is just beautiful.”
“Thanks to the utility crew working at Johnny Mercer Boulevard for stopping work and taking off their hats for the funeral procession that passed.”
“I love it when people pull into oncoming traffic to check their mail. Just park in your driveway and walk across the street!”
“If you can’t hire 100 policemen at $40,000 a year, hire 75 policemen at $53,000 a year.”
